home.title: Elliot Margot | AI & Power Platform Consultant
home.description: As a premier AI & Power Platform consultant, I help businesses transform operations by designing and deploying custom Generative AI and automation solutions.

about.title: About Elliot Margot | AI & Automation Specialist
about.description: Discover my professional journey in AI consulting and business process automation, from leading Generative AI chatbot development to architecting enterprise-grade solutions with Power Platform.

contact.title: Contact Elliot Margot | AI & Automation Consulting
contact.description: Get in touch to discuss your AI, Power Platform, and automation needs. Let's collaborate on your next digital transformation project.

experience.title: Professional Experience | Elliot Margot, AI Consultant
experience.description: Explore my detailed work history, from AI consulting at Witivio to leading Generative AI chatbot development at Assura, showcasing a journey of innovation and impact.

education.title: Academic Background | Elliot Margot
education.description: Explore my academic journey in business management and psychology, which forms the interdisciplinary foundation of my strategic approach to AI and automation.

certificates.title: Certificates & Diplomas | Elliot Margot
certificates.description: Browse a comprehensive list of my professional certifications in AI, Project Management, Product Management, and Cybersecurity, with links to verify each qualification.

useCases.title: AI Use Case Library | Elliot Margot's Portfolio
useCases.description: Explore a comprehensive library of real-world AI and Automation use cases, showcasing practical applications of Generative AI, Copilot Studio, and Power Automate.

blog.title: Blog | Insights on Generative AI & Automation by Elliot Margot
blog.description: Read my latest articles on Generative AI, process automation, Microsoft Power Platform, and the future of enterprise technology.

projects.title: Projects | Elliot Margot's AI Portfolio
projects.description: A curated collection of key projects and thought leadership pieces demonstrating practical applications of AI strategy, Generative AI, and Power Platform automation.

techStack.title: My Tech Stack | AI & Power Platform Expertise
techStack.description: A curated overview of the core platforms, technologies, and methodologies I use to build enterprise-grade AI and business process automation solutions.

contactMe.title: Contact Me
contactMe.description: Have a project in mind or want to collaborate? I'd love to hear from you.
